title: Quick Tabs logging format conventions
details:
The Quick Tabs extension uses consistent logging format with prefixes like [Component][Operation] followed by action types like START, COMPLETE, FILTER, VALIDATION, REQUEST, RESPONSE, FAILURE. When adding diagnostic logging to this extension:

1. Content script logging uses [Content][Operation] prefix (e.g., [Content][TabID], [Content][Hydration])
2. Background script logging uses [Background][Storage] prefix for storage operations
3. Manager sidebar logging uses [Manager][Display] or [Manager][Operation] prefix
4. Each log statement includes a structured context object with relevant data fields
5. Version comments use format: v1.6.3.10-vX - FIX Issue #N: Description

Key files for logging:
- src/content.js - Content script tab ID retrieval
- src/features/quick-tabs/index.js - Hydration process
- background.js - Storage change handler and deduplication
- sidebar/quick-tabs-manager.js - Manager display and operations
